resources.string: What are you doing for today?
Don\'t make me useless like you. Make a list. Then One by One finish them and after finishing a task cut that from list.Go make yourself proud.
Finish them and after finishing a task cut that from list.Go make me proud.Don\'t make me useless like you. Go move your ass and make a list of your task for today. make yourself proud.
